title: Robert Half Jobs Scraper
description: Extract job listings from Robert Half with support for keyword search, location filtering, and specialization. Uses efficient JSON API with HTML parsing fallback.

keyword.title: Search Keyword
keyword.description: Job title or keyword to search for (e.g., 'Accountant', 'Software Developer', 'Marketing Manager').

location.title: Location
location.description: City, state, or region to search for jobs (e.g., 'New York', 'California', 'Chicago, IL').

specialization.title: Specialization / Line of Business
specialization.description: Narrow your search by specialization. Options: 'Finance & Accounting', 'Technology', 'Marketing & Creative', 'Legal', 'Administrative'.

collectDetails.title: Collect Full Job Details
collectDetails.description: Enable to visit individual job pages for complete descriptions. Disable for faster scraping with API data only.

results_wanted.title: Maximum Results
results_wanted.description: Maximum number of job listings to scrape.

max_pages.title: Maximum Pages
max_pages.description: Maximum number of result pages to process (each page contains 25 jobs).

proxyConfiguration.title: Proxy Configuration
proxyConfiguration.description: Configure proxy settings. Recommended to use Apify Proxy for reliability.
